rukus.text: 3|55|Smarana karuna, yakhana allah‌ balalena, ‘he ‘isa! Niscaya ami apanake parigrahana karaba [1], amara nikata apanake uthiye niba [2] ebam yara kuphari kare tadera madhya theke apanake pabitra karaba. Ara apanara anusariganake keyamata paryanta pradhan'ya diba, tarapara amara kache'i tomadera pratyabartana. ’ Atahpara ye bisaye tomadera matantara ghateche ami tomadera madhye ta mimansa kare deba [3].
3|56|Tarapara yara kuphari kareche ami taderake duniya o akherate kathora sasti pradana karaba ebam tadera kono sahayyakari ne'i [1].
3|57|Ara yara imana eneche ebam satkaja kareche tini tadera pratiphala puropuribhabe pradana karabena. Ara allah‌ yalemaderake pachanda karena na.
3|58|Eta amara apanara nikata tela'oyata karachi ayatasamuha o hekamatapurna bani theke.
3|59|Niscaya allah‌ra nikata ‘isara drstanta adamera drstantasadrsa. Tini take mati theke srsti karechilena; tarapara take balechilena, ‘ha'o’, phale tini haye yana.
3|60|(Eta) apanara rabera nikata theke satya, kaje'i apani sandehakaridera antarbhukta habena na [1].

3|61|Atahpara apanara nikata jnana asara para ye ke'u e bisaye apanara sathe tarka kare take baluna, ‘esa, amara ahabana kari amadera putraderake o tomadera putraderake, amadera nariderake o tomadera nariderake, amadera nijederake o tomadera nijederake, tarapara amara mubahala (binita prarthana) kari, atahpara mithyabadidera upara de'i allah‌ra la’nata [1].’
3|62|Niscaya egulo satya bibarana ebam allah‌ chara an'ya kono haka ilah‌ ne'i. Ara niscaya allah‌, tini to parama parakramasali, prajnamaya.
3|63|Atahpara yadi tara mukha phiriye neya, tabe niscaya'i allah‌ phasadakaridera samparke samyaka abagata [1].
